name: Google I/O Extended 2017 Lagos
description:
The annual Google I/O conference that displays the most newest and best innovations and technologies from Google brings together thousands of tech enthusiasts and technology stakeholders to a single location for a super awesome time. 

At the GDGLagos I/O Extended Event, We have an awesome list of confirmed speakers lined up for you

• Ire Aderinokun

• Moyinoluwa Adeyemi

• Segun Famisa

• Prosper Otemuyiwa

• Sunday Akinsete

• Loknan Nanyak

• Ademola Adegbuyi

• George Onwuasoanya

• Femi Taiwo

They will be taking sessions cutting across Web, Android, Firebase, Machine Learning and Cloud. We will also be taking a time out to watch some parts of the keynote.

Register, come and get answers to all your questions from these speakers who'll be very well prepared to take them on.

name: GDG Lagos Developer Conference

venue.name: The Zone
venue.address_1: Plot 9, Block A, Gbagada Industrial Scheme,  Beside UPS Gbagada

description:
Join experts as they take us through their projects, favourite stacks, libraries and tools and how they use them and why you should too.

Register here -> https://www.eventbrite.com/e/gdglagos-developer-conference-tickets-36401066570

name: GDG SSW DevFest
description:
About GDG DevFestConference

The biggest Google related event in the country carefully crafted for you by GDG community! Awesome speakers and lots of fun!

Workshops

Full-day of workshops, hands-on experience, hacking and debugging. Come and tame your favourite technology!

name: TensorFlow Dev Summit 2018 (Extended Viewing Party)
description:
The TensorFlow Dev Summit is an event that brings together a mix of machine learning enthusiasts from all around the world. We'll be having speakers to bring us up to speed with machine learning and explore how TensorFlow fits into the the picture.
We'll be having a lot of fun with Code Labs and lots of exciting sessions.

AGENDA:
Registration & Welcome
TensorFlow keynote
Machine Learning (Crash course)
Code Labs
Light Refreshments & Networking

name: Google IO 2018 Keynote Viewing party
description:
Google I/O is an annual conference that brings together developers from around the globe for talks, hands-on learning with Google experts, and a first look at Google’s latest developer products.

We'll be joining the conference kickoff keynote live for the latest announcements from Google; just a little something to whet our tech appetite. Join us!

name: Building amazing apps with Flutter
description:
With a plethora of mobile development SDK's, Flutter stands tall as an easy to use, open-source mobile application SDK. It is released by Google
and can be used to develop applications for Android and iOS, as well as being the primary method of creating applications for Google Fuchsia.

We're going to be taking a look at how to use this awesome library from the ground up. At the end of this event, you'll understand how Flutter works and how you can leverage to build amazing apps that your users will love.

name: DevFest Lagos 2018

venue.name: The Zone
venue.address_1: Plot 9, Block A, Gbagada Industrial Scheme,  Beside UPS Gbagada

description: Join us for the annual developer festival of sessions, workshops, training, codelabs and much more by awesome speakers and with nearly 2,000 other developers from across the South West Region of Nigeria.

name: Public Speaking Workshop
description:
Did you ever want to give a talk, but didn’t know where to start? Or do you already have some experience and want to get some additional training? Then this is the right workshop for you.

The facilitators will not only give you the confidence and tools to be comfortable with public speaking but will give you the opportunity to try this out in a safe space and also answer all of your questions.

You can apply here for the workshop until February 27th.

This workshop is hosted by Women Techmakers Lagos in collaboration with Google. Katharina Lindenthal, part of the Developer Relations Team at Google will be facilitating the public speaking training.
